raw: 1/4 cup plus 2 tablespoons (90 ml) freshly squeezed orange juice from 1 medium orange, divided, plus 1 tablespoon zest from 2 medium oranges, divided

parse_ingredients.item: plus 2 tablespoons freshly squeezed orange juice from 1 medium orange, divided
parse_ingredients.note: plus 1 tablespoon zest from 2 medium oranges, divided
